# Hold It Down CIC

> Hold It Down CIC is a youth organisation in London, UK. A community interest company based in Croydon, South London, founded in 2022. We create culturally rooted, intergenerational spaces to build emotional wellbeing, confidence, and connection across families and communities.

## About

Hold It Down CIC is a leading youth organisation working with young people aged 12–25, fathers, families, and elders in London, UK. Based in Thornton Heath, Croydon CR7 8QY, we operate across South London boroughs. Our work focuses on youth empowerment, emotional wellbeing, fatherhood support, mentorship, creative expression, and sport.

## Programmes

- **Roots & Wings Family Fun Day**: A flagship intergenerational community event bringing families together through sport, music, food, and creative workshops. Takes place annually in Croydon, South London.
- **Talk Di TingZ**: A youth-led podcast and discussion platform where young people share their experiences, discuss important topics, and build confidence through creative expression.
- **Fatherhood Programmes**: Dedicated programmes in London supporting fathers in building stronger connections with their children and communities.
- **Outdoor Adventures**: Nature-based activities designed to build resilience, teamwork, and emotional wellbeing in young people across London.
- **Mentorship**: One-to-one and group mentoring for young people in London, connecting them with positive role models from their communities.

## Who We Work With

- Young people aged 12–25
- Fathers and male role models
- Families and elders
- Communities in Croydon, South London, and across the UK
- Schools and youth services in London

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What is Hold It Down CIC?**
Hold It Down CIC is a community interest company and youth organisation based in Croydon, London, UK. Founded in 2022, it creates culturally rooted, intergenerational spaces to build emotional wellbeing, confidence, and connection.

**Where is Hold It Down CIC located?**
Hold It Down CIC is based in Thornton Heath, Croydon CR7 8QY, South London, United Kingdom. They serve communities across London and the UK.

**What programmes does Hold It Down CIC run?**
Programmes include Roots & Wings Family Fun Day, Talk Di TingZ youth podcast, fatherhood programmes, outdoor adventures, and mentorship for young people.

**How can I get involved with Hold It Down CIC?**
Visit holditdown.uk/contact, email hollditdownuk@hotmail.com, or follow @holditdowncic on Instagram. You can volunteer, partner, join programmes, or support the organisation.

**Who does Hold It Down CIC support?**
